thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Emergent BioSolutions Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Emergent BioSolutions Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Emergent BioSolutions Inc:
* EMERGENT BIOSOLUTIONS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q1 REVENUE $117.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $140.4 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $205 MILLION TO $230 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.22 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMS FULL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL FORECAST AND OPERATIONAL GOALS
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $170.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.38, REVENUE VIEW $731.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
